  • Constructor Details

    • Window

      public Window​(Map map, Mission mission, TSP tsp, Controller controller)
      Constructor for window, create the main window and add the components. Associate also the map, the mission which are going to show on the application. Associate an instance tsp which is used to calculate the tour. Associate an instance controller which is used to controlle the system later.
      Parameters:
      map - the map which is going to show on the application.
      mission - the mission which is going to show on the application.
      tsp - an instance tsp which is used to calculate the tour.
      controller - an instance controller which is used to controlle the system later.

  • Method Details

    • getGraphicalView

      public GraphicalView getGraphicalView()
      Obtain the graphcalView which is used to draw or modify on the application
      Returns:
      graphicalView is used to draw or modifyon the application

    • getTextualView

      public TextualView getTextualView()
      Obtain the textualView which is used to add or modify or delete the table or the texual description
      Returns:
      textualView which is used to add or modify or delete the table or the texual description

    • getRate

      public double getRate()
      Obtain the rate which we used to zoom in or zoom out the map
      Returns:
      the rate which we used to zoom in or zoom out the map

    • allow

      public void allow​(java.lang.String state)
      Make sure that the buttons are enabled or disabled on different situation(state) given by state.
      Parameters:
      state - the String which contains the situation(state) of the application

    • allowUndoRedo

      public void allowUndoRedo​(java.lang.String type, boolean state)
      allows the Controller to enable or disable the undo/ redo buttons depending on whether there is any available command to undo/ redo
      Parameters:
      type - type of button, undo or redo
      state - the desired state of the button, enable(true) or disable(false)
